metadata.title: CVE-2024-33869 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Path traversal and command execution due to path reduction

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-33869` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.1
libgs-common - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.1
libgs10 - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.1
libgs10-common - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.1').
